CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 6, 1957, pg. 17 reads: "7. John Guay of the Drake Baking Company presents Mrs. Ophelia Jackson, 1104 Blackadore St., with A Wear-Ever Hallite home set. He awarded a duplicate set to Mrs. Irene Brown, 2833 Centre Ave."
TitMainTitle: John Guay of the Drake Baking Company presenting Ophelia Jackson with Wear-Ever Hallite set of pots and pans, posed in Syria Mosque for the 1957 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
